channel.title: What are RENDERS and SIGS srry im a noob

item.title: What are RENDERS and SIGS srry im a noob
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

More people? lmfao. They're not all called C4D renders -_-. They're called.. renders.

C4D = Cinema 4D. That's an application that I use, it's a modeler. You can make renders in it, same as every other modeler program.

Read full topic
item.source: What are RENDERS and SIGS srry im a noob

item.title: What are RENDERS and SIGS srry im a noob
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Well, renders have two meanings.

You get your C4D renders which are images that are 'rendered' by a 'renderer' (xD) to create an awesome, 3D image.

Or, you get your game renders, which are baically one main object seperated from it's background.

Sigs are signatures. Mine says to visit my website, as you can see down below. Most people have images in thier 'signatures,' so the images later adopted the name 'signature' because most of the time that's all thats there.

Read full topic
item.source: What are RENDERS and SIGS srry im a noob
